water.name: Water
water.description: A flask of clean, refreshing water.

short_sword.name: Short Sword
short_sword.description: A well-balanced short sword with a sharp blade.

dagger.name: Dagger
dagger.description: A small, quick blade perfect for close combat.

leather_armor.name: Leather Armor
leather_armor.description: Sturdy leather armor that provides basic protection.

cloth_robe.name: Cloth Robe
cloth_robe.description: A simple cloth robe favored by mages and scholars.

health_potion.name: Health Potion
health_potion.description: A red potion that instantly restores health.

mana_potion.name: Mana Potion
mana_potion.description: A blue potion that instantly restores mana.

rope.name: Rope
rope.description: Fifty feet of sturdy hemp rope.

torch.name: Torch
torch.description: A wooden torch that provides light in dark places.

bronze_gong.name: Bronze Gong
bronze_gong.description: A massive bronze gong mounted on an ornate stand. Its surface is covered in ancient runes and shows the green patina of age. When struck, it produces a deep, resonant tone that seems to call forth challenges from the depths.

stew.name: Hearty Stew
stew.description: A warm bowl of hearty stew with chunks of meat and vegetables.

apple.name: Apple
apple.description: A crisp, red apple that's perfect for a quick snack.

orange.name: Orange
orange.description: A juicy orange that provides refreshing nourishment.

grapes.name: Grapes
grapes.description: A cluster of sweet grapes, perfect for travel rations.

cinnamon.name: Cinnamon
cinnamon.description: A small pouch of aromatic cinnamon spice.

saffron.name: Saffron
saffron.description: Precious golden saffron threads, worth their weight in gold.

pepper.name: Black Pepper
pepper.description: A small container of freshly ground black pepper.

cooking_herbs.name: Cooking Herbs
cooking_herbs.description: A bundle of fresh herbs perfect for seasoning food.

rat_tail.name: Rat Tail
rat_tail.description: A long, scaly tail from a giant rat. Often used in alchemy.

small_bone.name: Small Bone
small_bone.description: A small animal bone that could be useful for crafting.

rusty_dagger.name: Rusty Dagger
rusty_dagger.description: A small, rusty blade that's seen better days. Still sharp enough to be dangerous.

goblin_ear.name: Goblin Ear
goblin_ear.description: A leathery green ear from a goblin. Some collectors pay well for these.

tattered_cloth.name: Tattered Cloth
tattered_cloth.description: A piece of worn, tattered cloth that might be useful for repairs.

bone_fragment.name: Bone Fragment
bone_fragment.description: A fragment of bone with an eerie magical aura. Necromancers value these.

rusty_sword.name: Rusty Sword
rusty_sword.description: An old, rusty sword that has lost much of its edge. Could be repaired by a skilled blacksmith.

ancient_coin.name: Ancient Coin
ancient_coin.description: An old coin from a long-forgotten kingdom. Valuable to collectors and historians.

wolf_pelt.name: Wolf Pelt
wolf_pelt.description: A thick, gray wolf pelt in good condition. Perfect for making warm clothing.

wolf_fang.name: Wolf Fang
wolf_fang.description: A sharp fang from a gray wolf. Could be fashioned into a necklace or charm.

raw_meat.name: Raw Meat
raw_meat.description: Fresh raw meat from a wild animal. Should be cooked before eating.

scroll_magic_missile.name: Scroll of Magic Missile
scroll_magic_missile.description: A scroll inscribed with the spell Magic Missile. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_heal.name: Scroll of Heal
scroll_heal.description: A scroll inscribed with the Heal spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_shield.name: Scroll of Shield
scroll_shield.description: A scroll inscribed with the Shield spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_lightning_bolt.name: Scroll of Lightning Bolt
scroll_lightning_bolt.description: A scroll inscribed with the Lightning Bolt spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_fireball.name: Scroll of Fireball
scroll_fireball.description: A scroll inscribed with the powerful Fireball spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_cure_wounds.name: Scroll of Cure Wounds
scroll_cure_wounds.description: A scroll inscribed with the Cure Wounds spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_of_murder.name: Scroll of Murder
scroll_of_murder.description: A dark scroll inscribed with the Murder spell. This powerful spell can oneshot anything. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

enchanted_blade.name: Enchanted Blade
enchanted_blade.description: A finely crafted sword that hums with magical energy. Its blade shimmers with an ethereal light.

champion_armor.name: Champion's Armor
champion_armor.description: Masterfully forged plate armor worn by legendary champions. Its dark metal surface seems to absorb light.

dark_essence.name: Dark Essence
dark_essence.description: A swirling vial of shadow energy harvested from powerful dark creatures. Used in powerful rituals and enchantments.

soul_gem.name: Soul Gem
soul_gem.description: A pristine gem that glows with an inner light. It seems to contain captured souls or pure magical essence.

ancient_ring.name: Ancient Ring
ancient_ring.description: A tarnished ring bearing ancient runes. It once belonged to a guardian of old.

guardian_sword.name: Guardian's Sword
guardian_sword.description: A well-preserved longsword carried by skeletal guardians. Despite its age, the blade remains sharp.

rusted_plate.name: Rusted Plate Armor
rusted_plate.description: Heavy plate armor corroded by time. Still offers some protection despite its condition.

cloak.name: Cloak
cloak.description: A simple traveler's cloak that offers minimal protection from the elements.

robes.name: Robes
robes.description: Plain cloth robes that provide basic protection while allowing freedom of movement.

cuirass.name: Leather Cuirass
cuirass.description: A well-crafted leather cuirass that provides solid protection without restricting mobility.

breastplate.name: Steel Breastplate
breastplate.description: A reinforced steel breastplate offering excellent protection for the torso.

ringmail.name: Ringmail Armor
ringmail.description: Interlocking iron rings form a flexible yet protective suit of armor.

chainmail.name: Chainmail Armor
chainmail.description: Heavy chainmail forged from iron links, offering substantial protection in battle.

scalemail.name: Scalemail Armor
scalemail.description: Overlapping steel scales create a formidable defensive barrier against attacks.

bandmail.name: Banded Mail Armor
bandmail.description: Heavy armor constructed from overlapping steel bands, providing superior protection.

platemail.name: Platemail Armor
platemail.description: Full suit of expertly crafted plate armor that offers exceptional protection to experienced warriors.

demonhide.name: Demonhide Armor
demonhide.description: Supple yet incredibly tough armor crafted from the hide of a demon. Its dark surface pulses with malevolent energy.

dragonscale.name: Dragonscale Armor
dragonscale.description: Legendary armor crafted from the iridescent scales of an ancient dragon. Nearly impervious to damage.

pink_teddy.name: Pink Teddy
pink_teddy.description: A mysteriously protective pink teddy bear outfit. Don't ask how it works - it just does.

blue_robes.name: Blue Robes
blue_robes.description: Ethereal blue robes that shimmer with powerful protective enchantments. Only the most skilled may wear them.

violet_robes.name: Violet Robes
violet_robes.description: Flowing violet robes imbued with ancient magics. Their true power remains hidden.

green_tunic.name: Green Tunic
green_tunic.description: A simple green tunic worn by travelers and adventurers. Provides minimal protection.

dwarven_scalemail.name: Dwarven Scalemail Armor
dwarven_scalemail.description: Masterwork scalemail forged by dwarven smiths in the deep halls. Offers unparalleled protection.

quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
quarterstaff.description: A sturdy wooden staff useful for both offense and defense.

shortsword.name: Shortsword
shortsword.description: A versatile short blade favored by adventurers.

mace.name: Mace
mace.description: A heavy mace designed to crush armor and bone.

warhammer.name: Warhammer
warhammer.description: A powerful warhammer that delivers devastating blows.

longsword.name: Longsword
longsword.description: A well-balanced longsword with excellent reach.

battleax.name: Battleax
battleax.description: A fearsome battle axe capable of cleaving through armor.

morningstar.name: Morningstar
morningstar.description: A spiked morningstar that inflicts brutal wounds.

broadsword.name: Broadsword
broadsword.description: A wide-bladed broadsword with deadly cutting power.

flail.name: Flail
flail.description: A weighted flail that strikes with unpredictable force.

halberd.name: Halberd
halberd.description: A long polearm combining axe, spike, and hook.

greatsword.name: Greatsword
greatsword.description: A massive two-handed sword wielded by the strongest warriors.

rimeax.name: Rimeax
rimeax.description: A frost-enchanted axe that unleashes a blast of frost on impact.

pyrehammer.name: Pyrehammer
pyrehammer.description: A flame-wreathed hammer that delivers a blast of flame with each strike.

levinblade.name: Levinblade
levinblade.description: A lightning-charged blade that releases a bolt of lightning upon hitting foes.

short_bow.name: Short Bow
short_bow.description: A compact bow suitable for hunting and skirmishing.

long_bow.name: Long Bow
long_bow.description: A powerful longbow with excellent range and accuracy.

crossbow.name: Crossbow
crossbow.description: A mechanical crossbow that fires deadly bolts.

great_bow.name: Great Bow
great_bow.description: An oversized bow requiring great strength to draw.

mithril_sword.name: Mithril Sword
mithril_sword.description: A legendary blade forged from gleaming mithril.

darksword.name: Darksword
darksword.description: A shadowy blade that seems to absorb light.

sling.name: Sling
sling.description: A simple leather sling for hurling stones.

blowgun.name: Blowgun
blowgun.description: A hollow tube for launching poisoned darts silently.

elven_bow.name: Elven Bow
elven_bow.description: An elegant elven bow imbued with magical energy, releasing a bolt of energy.

stick.name: Stick
stick.description: A crude wooden stick with minimal offensive capability.

wooden_mallet.name: Wooden Mallet
wooden_mallet.description: A simple wooden mallet used as an improvised weapon.

dwarven_battleax.name: Dwarven Battleax
dwarven_battleax.description: A masterwork battleaxe forged in the deep halls by dwarven smiths.

tentacle.name: Tentacle
tentacle.description: A writhing appendage that grasps and crushes.

thorny_branch.name: Thorny Branch
thorny_branch.description: A gnarled branch covered in wicked thorns.

gnashing_teeth.name: Gnashing Teeth
gnashing_teeth.description: Sharp teeth designed for tearing flesh.

huge_gnashing_teeth.name: Huge Gnashing Teeth
huge_gnashing_teeth.description: Massive fangs capable of rending armor.

choking_vines.name: Choking Vines
choking_vines.description: Thick vines that constrict and suffocate.

demonic_claws.name: Demonic Claws
demonic_claws.description: Cursed talons that rend both flesh and soul.

shadow_claws.name: Shadow Claws
shadow_claws.description: Ephemeral claws formed from pure darkness.

wicked_claws.name: Wicked Claws
wicked_claws.description: Cruelly curved claws that inflict grievous wounds.

razor_sharp_talons.name: Razor Sharp Talons
razor_sharp_talons.description: Talons honed to a razor's edge.

hellish_claws.name: Hellish Claws
hellish_claws.description: Infernal claws burning with unholy fire.

pincers.name: Pincers
pincers.description: Crushing pincers like those of a giant crab.

gaping_mouth.name: Gaping Mouth
gaping_mouth.description: A cavernous maw filled with teeth.

toothy_maw.name: Toothy Maw
toothy_maw.description: A tooth-lined mouth built for devouring.

wicked_bite.name: Wicked Bite
wicked_bite.description: A bite attack that tears deeply.

hooked_beak.name: Hooked Beak
hooked_beak.description: A sharp, hooked beak for rending.

gaping_maw.name: Gaping Maw
gaping_maw.description: A massive mouth that swallows prey whole.

talons.name: Talons
talons.description: Sharp talons for gripping and tearing.

glowing_sword.name: Glowing Sword
glowing_sword.description: A radiant sword that emanates holy light.

huge_talons.name: Huge Talons
huge_talons.description: Enormous talons capable of seizing large prey.

crystalline_sword.name: Crystalline Sword
crystalline_sword.description: A blade of pure crystal that refracts light into deadly rainbows.

flaming_greatsword.name: Flaming Greatsword
flaming_greatsword.description: A massive greatsword wreathed in perpetual flames.

enormous_talons.name: Enormous Talons
enormous_talons.description: Colossal talons that can crush stone.

smouldering_great_axe.name: Smouldering Great Axe
smouldering_great_axe.description: An enormous axe that smolders with barely contained fire.

smouldering_great_spear.name: Smouldering Great Spear
smouldering_great_spear.description: A legendary spear crackling with volcanic heat.

crystalline_talons.name: Crystalline Talons
crystalline_talons.description: Razor-sharp talons formed from magical crystal.

glowing_bardiche.name: Glowing Bardiche
glowing_bardiche.description: A polearm that shines with divine radiance.

huge_glowing_sabre.name: Huge Glowing Sabre
huge_glowing_sabre.description: An oversized sabre pulsing with magical energy.

demon_sword.name: Demon Sword
demon_sword.description: An unholy blade wreathed in poison, forged in the depths of hell.

animate_sword.name: Animate Sword
animate_sword.description: A sentient blade that channels a huge blast of flame through its wielder.

waterskin.name: Waterskin
waterskin.description: A leather waterskin for carrying water.

glowstone.name: Glowstone
glowstone.description: A magical stone that emanates a soft, eternal light.

heartstone.name: Heartstone
heartstone.description: A mystical stone that can recall you to safety.

rue_potion.name: Rue Potion
rue_potion.description: A minor healing potion that restores a small amount of health.

amaranth_potion.name: Amaranth Potion
amaranth_potion.description: A healing potion that restores moderate health.

anemone_potion.name: Anemone Potion
anemone_potion.description: A powerful healing potion that restores significant health.

yarrow_potion.name: Yarrow Potion
yarrow_potion.description: A potion that restores a small amount of mana.

rowan_potion.name: Rowan Potion
rowan_potion.description: A potion that temporarily increases strength.

hyssop_potion.name: Hyssop Potion
hyssop_potion.description: A potion that temporarily increases dexterity.

vervain_potion.name: Vervain Potion
vervain_potion.description: A potion that grants temporary invisibility.

horn_of_frost.name: Horn Of Frost
horn_of_frost.description: A magical horn that unleashes a blast of frost when sounded.

wand_of_lightning.name: Wand Of Lightning
wand_of_lightning.description: A wand that channels bolts of lightning at your foes.

rod_of_flame.name: Rod Of Flame
rod_of_flame.description: A powerful rod that projects blasts of searing flame.

iron_key.name: Iron Key
iron_key.description: A iron key that unlocks specific doors.

copper_key.description: A copper key that unlocks specific doors.

brass_key.description: A brass key that unlocks specific doors.

bronze_key.description: A bronze key that unlocks specific doors.

silver_key.description: A silver key that unlocks specific doors.

electrum_key.description: A electrum key that unlocks specific doors.

gold_key.description: A gold key that unlocks specific doors.

platinum_key.description: A platinum key that unlocks specific doors.

pearl_key.name: Pearl Key
pearl_key.description: A pearl key that unlocks specific doors.

ruby_key.name: Ruby Key
ruby_key.description: A ruby key that unlocks specific doors.

runestaff.name: Runestaff
runestaff.description: An ancient staff inscribed with powerful runes.

arrow.name: Arrow
arrow.description: A wooden arrow with steel tip.

quiver.name: Quiver
quiver.description: A leather quiver for holding arrows.

soulstone.name: Soulstone
soulstone.description: A rare gem that can capture and hold souls.

manastone.name: Manastone
manastone.description: A crystalline stone that greatly restores mana.

dragon_ring.name: Dragon Ring
dragon_ring.description: A dragon ring that unlocks specific doors.

gome_ring.name: Gome Ring
gome_ring.description: A gome ring that unlocks specific doors.

strato_ring.description: A strato ring that unlocks specific doors.

pink_rose.description: A pink rose that unlocks specific doors.

white_rose.name: White Rose
white_rose.description: A white rose that unlocks specific doors.

wynharp.name: Wynharp
wynharp.description: A legendary musical instrument of great power.

red_rose.name: Red Rose
red_rose.description: A red rose that unlocks specific doors.

black_rose.name: Black Rose
black_rose.description: A dark rose that emanates an aura of shadow.

opal_key.name: Opal Key
opal_key.description: A opal key that unlocks specific doors.

tigereye_key.name: Tigereye Key
tigereye_key.description: A tigereye key that unlocks specific doors.

quartz_key.description: A quartz key that unlocks specific doors.

topaz_key.name: Topaz Key
topaz_key.description: A topaz key that unlocks specific doors.

rod_of_power.name: Rod Of Power
rod_of_power.description: An artifact of immense magical power.

flame_crystal.name: Flame Crystal
flame_crystal.description: A crystal that burns with eternal flame.

stone.name: Stone
stone.description: A smooth stone suitable for slinging.

pouch.name: Pouch Of Stones
pouch.description: A leather pouch for carrying sling stones.

blowdart.name: Blowdart
blowdart.description: A small poisoned dart for blowguns.

ice_crystal.name: Ice Crystal
ice_crystal.description: A crystal frozen in perpetual winter.

stone_key.name: Ornate Stone Key
stone_key.description: A ornate stone key that unlocks specific doors.

small_barrel.name: Small Barrel
small_barrel.description: A small wooden barrel for storing water.

preserved_rations.name: Preserved Rations
preserved_rations.description: Well-preserved food suitable for long journeys.
